remarks: Value of map from vectors to functionals at the reference vector ` E ` .  (Contributed by NM, 16-May-2015.)
statement:
hdmapevec.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmapevec.e $e |- E = <. ( _I |` ( Base ` K ) ) , ( _I |` ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) ) >. $.
hdmapevec.j $e |- J = ( ( HVMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapevec.s $e |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapevec.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hdmapevec $p |- ( ph -> ( S ` E ) = ( J ` E ) ) $.
